name: .NET 8
description: Major LTS release with improved performance, Native AOT support, enhanced minimal APIs, and new middleware like output caching and rate limiting.

name: Azure DevOps
description: A mature, enterprise-grade suite for source control, CI/CD pipelines, agile planning, and test management. Deeply integrated with the Microsoft ecosystem and ideal for teams using the .NET stack.

name: Workday
description: A leading cloud-based enterprise platform for human capital management (HCM), payroll, and financial planning. Widely adopted in large organizations for HR and finance operations.

name: GraphQL
description: A query language and runtime for APIs that enables clients to request exactly the data they need. Ideal for modern frontend-backend communication, especially in microservices and BFF patterns.

name: OData
description: An open protocol for building and consuming RESTful APIs with standardized query options. Worth assessing for enterprise data services, especially if integrating with Microsoft products or requiring rich querying capabilities.

name: Kubernetes
description: The leading container orchestration platform for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications. Core to modern cloud-native infrastructure and our primary compute hosting environment.

name: Specmatic
description: A contract testing tool that automates consumer-driven contract tests for APIs using OpenAPI specs, helping ensure API compatibility and preventing integration issues.

name: Pact
description: A popular contract testing framework supporting multiple languages to verify interactions between service consumers and providers, reducing integration risks.

name: Microsoft Fabric
description: The integrated data analytics platform from Microsoft that consolidates Power BI, data engineering, and data science workloads. Adopted as part of the Power BI Premium migration to Fabric capacities.

name: Visual Studio
description: The full-featured, integrated development environment (IDE) from Microsoft widely used for .NET, C++, and other languages, providing comprehensive debugging, testing, and profiling tools.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: A lightweight, extensible, and cross-platform code editor favored by many developers for its speed, customizability, and rich ecosystem of extensions.

name: Mural
description: A collaborative online whiteboard platform used for brainstorming, workshops, and visual collaboration, enhancing remote team engagement and design thinking processes.

name: NiceCXOne
description: A cloud-based customer experience platform offering omnichannel routing, workforce engagement, analytics, and automation to improve contact center operations and customer satisfaction.

name: Dynamics 365 CRM
description: Microsoft’s cloud-hosted CRM solution providing sales, marketing, and customer service capabilities with seamless integration into the Microsoft 365 ecosystem, delivered as a scalable SaaS on Azure.

name: DocuWare
description: A cloud and on-premises document management and workflow automation platform that helps organizations digitize, manage, and securely store documents and automate business processes.

name: DocuSign
description: A widely used cloud-based platform for electronic signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation, enabling secure and legally binding digital transactions.

name: FlexiCapture
description: An AI-powered document processing platform that automates data extraction from structured and unstructured documents, enabling efficient digitization and workflow automation.

name: Freshdesk
description: A cloud-based customer support platform offering ticketing, automation, self-service portals, and multi-channel support to streamline customer service operations.

name: TextEl
description: An SMS messaging platform integrated with NICE CXone to enable omnichannel customer engagement through text messaging, enhancing contact center communications.

name: Twilio SendGrid
description: A cloud-based email delivery service used for transactional and marketing email notifications in application development, known for scalability, deliverability, and robust APIs.

name: HubSpot
description: An all-in-one inbound marketing, sales, and customer service platform that combines CRM, email marketing, and automation tools. Currently being evaluated for potential adoption.

name: WordPress
description: A widely used open-source content management system powering our externally facing state websites, known for its extensibility, plugin ecosystem, and ease of content publishing.
